gl.giskaland

Class DbManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • SQLiteOpenHelper
      • gl.giskaland.DbManager

  • public class DbManager
extends SQLiteOpenHelper
    Created by tumsgis on 26.2.2015. DbManager. Provides access to the giskaland database.

      • createDatabase

        public void createDatabase()
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Creates a new database.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • openDatabase

        public void openDatabase()
                  throws SQLiteException
        Opens the database.
        Throws:
        SQLiteException

      • updateScore

        public void updateScore(java.lang.String table,
                        int id,
                        int lvl,
                        int change,
                        boolean init)
        The scores for level "lvl" in "table" in the database is updated, or set to 0 if init is true.
        Parameters:
        table - The name of the table from the database.
        id - The _id of the row to update.
        lvl - The difficulty level of the game (1-3)
        change - The change of the score
        init - Indicates whether we are initializing the score or not.

      • insertRow

        public void insertRow(java.lang.String table,
                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> rowData)
        "rowData" is inserted into "table" in the database.
        Parameters:
        table - The name of the table from the database
        rowData - One row of data, according to "table".

      • deleteRow

        public void deleteRow(java.lang.String table,
                      int id)
        The row with the _id "id" from "table" in the database is deleted.
        Parameters:
        table - The name of the table from the database
        id - The _id of the row to update.

      • getData

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getData(java.lang.String table,
                                                int id,
                                                int attr)
        Parameters:
        table - The name of the table from the database
        id - The _id of the row to update.
        attr - The number of attributes "table" has
        Returns:
        The row corresponding to "id". If that row does not exist the return value is a list of 0's.

      • getAllQuestions

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> getAllQuestions()
        Specifically for the Questions table.
        Returns:
        All the data (all questions and answers) from the Questions table from the database, returned as a list of lists of strings.

      • close

        public void close()
        Close this database.

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(SQLiteDatabase db)
        Run when the database is created.
        Parameters:
        db - This database

      • onUpgrade

        public void onUpgrade(SQLiteDatabase db,
                      int oldVersion,
                      int newVersion)
        Run when the version number of this database is changed.
        Parameters:
        db - This database
        oldVersion - Number of the old version of the database.
        newVersion - Number of the new version of the database.
